000110 00000 00001 0000000000000001 -- r1 = r0 ^ 1
000101 00000 00010 0000000000000001 -- r2 = r0 | 1
010000 00001 00010 00011 00000000000 -- r3 = r1 + r2
000000 00011 00011 0000000000110000 -- r3 = r3 + '0'
010010 00011 00000 0000000000000001 -- print r3
010010 00000 00000 0000000000000011 -- halt
